snippet.title: 【STEAM】TroubleDays  Trailer ENG
snippet.description:
Cohabitation with a naive succubus?! In this love-adventure game set in Akihabara, you can enjoy the sweetly thrilling and slightly naughty day-to-day life with an innocent succubus!

■STEAM STORE
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1171270/TroubleDays/

■Cast
Lovelia:CV Yui Ayase

■Product Information
Title:TroubleDays
Platform:STEAM
Release:Spring 2020
Genre:ADV
player:One player
Text language:English,Japanese,Traditional Chinese,Simplified characters
Voice language:Japanese
Official web:https://qureate.net/troubledays/en/

Illustration:AkasaAi
Scenario:Kashima Natsuki（Linkedbrain Inc.）
Producer:Yujiro Usuda
Publisher:qureate

The latest information is being distributed on Twitter!
https://twitter.com/qureate

©2020 qureate
